comments.comments_text: A dangerous looking corner kick from Joshua Kimmich (Bayern Munich) is cleared to safety by the defence.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A dangerous looking corner kick from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is cleared to safety by the defence.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Joshua Kimmich (Bayern Munich) comes to nothing.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) comes to nothing.

comments.comments_text: What a beautiful moment! Kingsley Coman (Bayern Munich) got to the ball and unleashed a strong shot from distance. It turned out to be a good decision as his effort found its way into the bottom right corner. Koen Casteels just shakes his head in disbelief. The score changes to 0:1.

It turned out to be a good decision as his effort found its way into the bottom right corner. [PLAYER] just shakes his head in disbelief. The score changes to 0:1.
